Articles.Content:
Well it has been an exciting day with .25 out and after testing for myself what addons are working and waiting patiently till some are fixed (knowing full well, some may never be), its time to actually play!

But not before I give my huge THANK YOU to all the gals and guys that are burning the midnight oil on so many of the up coming days, just to enhance our game play experience with their visions. Although you might be beating your head against the keyboard wondering why it wont do what its suppose to do, or gripping the sides of your monitor staring at another "ummm i think its broken" post on your thread, you all need to know that you are appreciated, and your investments in time do not go unnoticed.

I haven't even checked the Official Compatibility Mod thread yet (about to).

What I need for my next playthrough (which will happen on .25 (I'm gonna finish my current on .24.2 first.)

-MJ

-FAR

-Karbonite (maybe K+ too) instead of the usual Kethane

-SCANsat

-Procedural Fairings

-Near Future Solar Panels

-KAS (I cannot even think about dropping this)

That's pretty much it as far as gameplay goes. Other enhancements can wait.
